name: Top Pyramid+
description:
There are many versions of Pyramid Solitaire out there. What makes mine different from all the others? ELEGANCE!. Simplicity and details has been crafted to the game as well as the ability to customize it. Many game options are available to meet the toughest requirements people might have. Top Pyramid is using engine of popular McSolitaire.

So this app is having the experience and know how of its predecessor. I will not go throughout all the features in the app because there are so many of them. It is fun to discover them as you play.

If you are a fan of Pyramid Solitaire card game, you're in for a ride with Top Pyramid!
